participant_1.background:
I am a hard worker who is always looking for ways to improve myself.
I'm not in a relationship, but I'm looking for someone who can appreciate my ability to say the alphabet backwards.
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
i like to make cellphone apps that would help heal our world.
I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.

participant_2.background:
I have a soft spot for poodles, so I would love to have a plush poodle in my nursery.
i can make fart noises with my arm pits , even some musical melody.
I ran my first 5k race with my spouse and child cheering me on.
i like to wear boots.
i am angry at my coworker.

content.text: What's your favorite way to relax?
I like to go for walks in the park and play with my dog.
I love dogs! I grew up on a farm with a bunch of them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I live in the city, so I don't get to see dogs as often as I'd like.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you would love to have a dog of your own.
I do! I'm hoping to get one soon.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find a great dog to add to your family.
Thanks! I'm excited to start looking.
What kind of dog are you looking for?
I'm not sure yet. I'm open to any kind of dog, as long as it's a good fit for my lifestyle.
That makes sense. I'm sure you'll find the perfect dog for you.
Thanks! I hope so.
In the meantime, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, go to the movies, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great! It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, it does! I'm glad we're talking.
Me too! This has been a lot of fun.
Me too! I'm happy to have met you.
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
I'd love that!
